name: DJ Sharpnel
description: '''DJ Sharpnel''' is a Japanese [[music duo]] composed of Jea and Lemmy, who are signed under their [[d≈çjin music|independent]] record label Sharpnelsound. They are credited for pioneering the [[J-core]] genre, recognized for their [[speedcore]], [[gabber]], [[happy hardcore]] and [[Trance music|trance]] productions.
